channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.description:
Outside of Stollards Close, sunken manhole getting worse due to nearby building works
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve

item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Abandoned barriers on pavements, 8th May
item.description:
There are several red plastic barriers leaning against tree stumps which partially block the pavements and are an eyesore. They have been there for many months. Please remove the barriers, and/or remove the stumps if that is why they are there. Near the first couple of houses at the start of Bournside Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Bournside Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Obstruction by unpermitted skip, scaffolding, building material on pavement

item.title: Grass very high needs cutting, 8th May
item.description:
It is getting very difficult to see when turning into Andoversford from the A40 off the dual carriageway. The middle section need cutting.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Andoversford Bypass, Whittington, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black & white horse charging and attacking dogs when walking on footpath, 8th May
item.description:
This new horse is aiming for dogs on or off leads and charging at them. Very intimidating
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pine Halt, Andoversford, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gl54 4et Entrance to Hewletts Farm, 8th May
item.description:
The road at the edge has formed a large gulley caused by the large amount of water which flows down the hill during storms. Cars passing on this sharp bend could be damaged.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aggs Hill, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sudden Drop in level of verge., 8th May
item.description:
Going down Aggs hill just past the entrance of Northfield Farm the verge is stone. Suddenly the stone verge ends and there is a large drop in level. When pulling in to allow two cars to pass on this narrow area your car suddenly drops and this could cause damage to the underside of a vehicle. Needs to be sloped.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aggs Hill, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Spring is coming through tarmac and road is breaking up, 8th May
item.description:
Middle of road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 60, School Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham

item.title: 50cm sinkhole in pavement, 8th May
item.description:
On the corner of Windermere Road where it turns into Coniston Road. It appeared today was not there this morning

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Coniston Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Fallen tree blocking footpath, 8th May
item.description:
A tree is down across the footpath leading from the bottom of Tansy Close in to the Meadows. It has been there for at least 4 weeks. It is just before the gate in to the field and people are having to break through the undergrowth to gain access.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bay Tree Road, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Welch Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: Terrible/dangerous road condition, 8th May
item.description:
Terrible road condition. Has been patched up numerous times and is now like a very uneven and poorly repaired patchwork quilt, just much more bumpy. It really is a terrible bit of road and is danger to cyclists! Please resurface the road not just patching!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandford Mill Road, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole, 8th May
item.description:
Large pothole on this road leading to junction. Please repair!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Sandford Mill Road, Tivoli, Cheltenham

item.title: Numerous large potholes on Thirlestaine Road, 8th May
item.description:
Numerous large potholes on Thirlestaine Road near entrances to Cheltenham College prep school and also near the entrance to the sports facilties. Please repair as the potholes are large!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kew Place, Naunton, Cheltenham

item.title: Incorrect Road Signs, 8th May
item.description:
Hailes Street, Winchcombe. Despite Road Closure signs, the road is open and being used by traffic. Is it closed or not?

item.description:

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 8th May
item.description:
gen enq rcvd 08.05.24 - customer reported very overgrown and unmaintained tree behind the rear fence of their property and abutting onto parking area at Whitworth Mews. Tewkesbury Borough Council say it is not theirs and there is no tree preservation order on it. Please could someone check the tree? Thank you.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole TENNYSON ROAD, 8th May
item.description:
Manhole cover, noise has got worse part of manhole is lifting as cars pass over it. An accident waiting to happen
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Tennyson Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
